title: Nighttime city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives down a city street at night with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving down a city street at night. There are several other cars on the road, including a parked truck on the right side of the street. The road is well-lit with streetlights and there are palm trees lining the street. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving down the city street at a very slow speed, with multiple braking events likely due to the presence of other vehicles on the road. The driver is being cautious and maintaining a safe distance from the other cars to avoid any collisions. The parked truck on the right side of the street may have obstructed the driver's view of upcoming traffic, leading to the need for frequent braking. Overall, the driver is prioritizing safety and following the rules of the road to ensure a smooth and accident-free journey.
